com.squareup.picasso

Interface Downloader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OkHttp3Downloader, OkHttpDownloader, UrlConnectionDownloader

    public interface Downloader
    A mechanism to load images from external resources such as a disk cache and/or the internet.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Downloader.Response
      Response stream or bitmap and info.
      static class  Downloader.ResponseException
      Thrown for non-2XX responses.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Downloader.Response load(android.net.Uri uri, int networkPolicy)
      Download the specified image url from the internet.
      void shutdown()
      Allows to perform a clean up for this Downloader including closing the disk cache and other resources.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        Downloader.Response load(android.net.Uri uri,
                       int networkPolicy)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Download the specified image url from the internet.
        Parameters:
        uri - Remote image URL.
        networkPolicy - The NetworkPolicy used for this request.
        Returns:
        Downloader.Response containing either a Bitmap representation of the request or an InputStream for the image data. null can be returned to indicate a problem loading the bitmap.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the requested URL cannot successfully be loaded.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Allows to perform a clean up for this Downloader including closing the disk cache and other resources.
